```{r}
library(curl)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
f <- curl("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fuzzyatelin/fuzzyatelin.github.io/master/AN597_Fall17/zombies.csv")
d <- read.csv(f, header = TRUE, sep = ",", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

n <- mutate(d) %>% filter(major=="medicine/nursing")

plot(data = n, age ~ years_of_education)


g <- ggplot(data = n, aes(x = years_of_education, y = age, color = factor(gender)))
g <- g + geom_point()
g <- g + geom_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ x)
g

```
